person.persName: Sydney Small (Todd Co, Ky, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Muir Small in Todd County on December 21, 1836. Father of Robert S. Small, William T. Small, John E. Small, Thomas B. Small, Ben Small, Joseph Muir Small, Margaret A. Small, Mary E. Small, Brookin Small, N.B. Small. Owned four enslaved persons in Todd County, Kentucky, in 1840. Farmer in Todd County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Todd County in 1850. Farmer in Todd County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
